00032 #include <stdio.h>
00033 #include "mscb.h"
00034 
00035 extern bit FREEZE_MODE;
00036 
00037 char code node_name[] = "GENERIC";
00038 
00039 /*---- Define channels and configuration parameters returned to
00040        the CMD_GET_INFO command                                 ----*/
00041 
00042 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00043 
00044 struct {
00045    unsigned char p1;
00046    unsigned int dac0;
00047    unsigned int dac1;
00048    unsigned int adc[8];
00049 } user_data;
00050 
00051 struct {
00052    unsigned char adc_average;
00053 } user_conf;
00054 
00055 
00056 MSCB_INFO_CHN code channel[] = {
00057    1, 0, 0, 0, "P1", &user_data.p1,
00058    2, 0, 0, 0, "DAC0", &user_data.dac0,
00059    2, 0, 0, 0, "DAC1", &user_data.dac1,
00060    2, 0, 0, 0, "ADC0", &user_data.adc[0],
00061    2, 0, 0, 0, "ADC1", &user_data.adc[1],
00062    2, 0, 0, 0, "ADC2", &user_data.adc[2],
00063    2, 0, 0, 0, "ADC3", &user_data.adc[3],
00064    2, 0, 0, 0, "ADC4", &user_data.adc[4],
00065    2, 0, 0, 0, "ADC5", &user_data.adc[5],
00066    2, 0, 0, 0, "ADC6", &user_data.adc[6],
00067    2, 0, 0, 0, "ADC7", &user_data.adc[7],
00068    0
00069 };
00070 
00071 MSCB_INFO_CHN code conf_param[] = {
00072    1, 0, 0, 0, "ADCAvrg", &user_conf.adc_average,
00073    0
00074 };

00076 /********************************************************************\
00077 
00078   Application specific init and inout/output routines
00079 
00080 \********************************************************************/
00081 
00082 void user_write(unsigned char channel);
00083 
00084 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00085 
00086 void user_init(void)
00087 {
00088 #ifdef CPU_ADUC812
00089    ADCCON1 = 0x7C;              // power up ADC, 14.5us conv+acq time
00090    ADCCON2 = 0;                 // select channel to convert
00091    DACCON = 0x1f;               // power on DACs
00092 #endif
00093 
00094 #ifdef CPU_C8051F000
00095    AMX0CF = 0x00;               // select single ended analog inputs
00096    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00097    ADC0CN = 0x80;               // enable ADC 
00098 
00099    REF0CN = 0x03;               // enable internal reference
00100    DAC0CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC0
00101    DAC1CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC1
00102 #endif
00103 
00104    /* correct initial EEPROM value */
00105    if (user_conf.adc_average == 0xFF)
00106       user_conf.adc_average = 0;
00107 
00108    /* write P1 and DACs */
00109    user_write(0);
00110    user_write(1);
00111    user_write(2);
00112 }
00113 
00114 /*---- User write function -----------------------------------------*/
00115 
00116 #pragma NOAREGS
00117 
00118 void user_write(unsigned char channel)
00119 {
00120    unsigned char data *d;
00121 
00122    switch (channel) {
00123    case 0:                     // p1 
00124       P1 = user_data.p1;
00125       break;
00126 
00127    case 1:                     // DAC0
00128       d = (void *) &user_data.dac0;
00129 #ifdef CPU_ADUC812
00130       DAC0H = d[1];
00131       DAC0L = d[0];
00132 #endif
00133 #ifdef CPU_C8051F000
00134       DAC0L = d[0];
00135       DAC0H = d[1];
00136 #endif
00137       break;
00138 
00139    case 2:                     // DAC1
00140       d = (void *) &user_data.dac1;
00141 #ifdef CPU_ADUC812
00142       DAC1H = d[1];
00143       DAC1L = d[0];
00144 #endif
00145 #ifdef CPU_C8051F000
00146       DAC1L = d[0];
00147       DAC1H = d[1];
00148 #endif
00149       break;
00150    }
00151 }
00152 
00153 /*---- User read function ------------------------------------------*/
00154 
00155 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char channel)
00156 {
00157    if (channel == 0)
00158       user_data.p1 = P1;
00159 
00160    return 0;
00161 }
00162 
00163 /*---- User write config function ----------------------------------*/
00164 
00165 void user_write_conf(unsigned char channel)
00166 {
00167    if (channel);
00168 }
00169 
00170 /*---- User read config function -----------------------------------*/
00171 
00172 void user_read_conf(unsigned char channel)
00173 {
00174    if (channel);
00175 }
00176 
00177 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00178 
00179 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char idata * data_in, unsigned char idata * data_out)
00180 {
00181    /* return some dummy data */
00182    data_out[0] = data_in[0] + 1;
00183    data_out[1] = data_in[1] + 1;
00184    return 2;
00185 }
00186 
00187 /*---- User loop function ------------------------------------------*/
00188 
00189 void adc_read(channel, unsigned int *d)
00190 {
00191    unsigned long value;
00192    unsigned int i, n;
00193 
00194    AMX0SL = channel & 0x0F;
00195 
00196    n = 1 << (user_conf.adc_average + 4);
00197 
00198    value = 0;
00199    for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00200       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00201 
00202       ADCINT = 0;
00203       ADBUSY = 1;
00204       while (!ADCINT);          // wait until conversion ready, does NOT work with ADBUSY!
00205 
00206       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00207 
00208       value += (ADC0L | (ADC0H << 8));
00209       watchdog_refresh();
00210    }
00211 
00212    if (user_conf.adc_average)
00213       value >>= (user_conf.adc_average);
00214 
00215    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00216    *d = value;
00217    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00218 }
00219 
00220 void user_loop(void)
00221 {
00222    unsigned char i;
00223 
00224    /* don't take data in freeze mode */
00225    if (!FREEZE_MODE);
00226    {
00227       for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00228          adc_read(i, &user_data.adc[i]);
00229 
00230       lcd_goto(0, 0);
00231       printf("%6.4f V", user_data.adc[0] / 65536.0 * 2.5);
00232    }
00233 }
